#summary Keyboard Shortcuts

|| F  || Time:Faster || Speed up time by one level. ||
|| S  || Time:Slower || Slow down time by one level, down to real-time (1 s = 1 s). ||
|| Shift+F  || Time:Maximum || Set time to maximum. ||
|| Shift+Alt+F  || Time:Super Fast || Set time to "way beyond maximum". ||
|| Shift+S  || Time:Minimum || Set time to real-time. ||
|| Shift+Alt+S  || Time:Slow Motion || Set time to slow motion. ||
|| Shift+Ctrl+Alt+S  || Time:Super-Slow Motion || Set time to the minimum simulatable time unit.||
|| P  || Time:Pause || Pause time. ||
|| Shift+P  || Time:Unpause || Unpause time. ||

|| Z  || Visual:Zoom In || Zoom in on the visual view. ||
|| X  || Visual:Zoom Out || Zoom out of the visual view. ||
|| Shift+Z  || Visual:Move In || Move closer to the tracked object (external view) ||
|| Shift+X  || Visual:Move Out || Move further away from the tracked object (external view ) ||

||  ||
|| Menu+Z  || Tactical:Zoom In || Zoom in on the tactical view. ||
|| Menu+X  || Tactical:Zoom Out || Zoom out of the tactical view. ||
||  ||
|| Alt+Z  || Ground Track:Zoom In || Zoom in on the ground track. ||
|| Alt+X  || Ground Track:Zoom Out || Zoom out of the ground track. ||

|| Shift+1  || Display:Launch Config || Switch to the "Launch/Reentry" panel over the MEDS  (or use the switch) ||
|| Shift+2  || Display:Landing Config || Switch to the "Landing/Docking" panel. ||

|| F1  || Display:Groundtrack Mode ||
|| F2  || Display:Half Visual Mode ||
|| F3  || Display:Half Tactical Mode ||
|| F4  || Display:Tactical View || 
|| F5  || Display:Full Visual View ||  
|| F6  || Display:Structure View ||
 
|| Menu+A  || Sequencer:Abort || 
 
|| Menu+Q  || Dialog:Exit || 
 
|| Keypad-Up  || Control:Translate +Y || 
|| Keypad-Down  || Control:Translate -Y ||
|| Keypad-Right  || Control:Translate +X ||
|| Keypad-Left  || Control:Translate -X || 
|| Keypad-PgUp  || Control:Translate +Z || 
|| Keypad-Home  || Control:Translate -Z || 
|| (with Shift) || (slow rate of translation) || 
 
|| Menu+1  || Control:Throttle Off || 
|| Menu+5  || Control:Throttle 50% || 
|| Menu+0  || Control:Throttle 100% ||  
 
|| N  || Visual:Toggle Night Vision ||  
|| D  || Visual:Toggle Show Decals ||
|| C  || Visual:Next Camera ||  
|| Shift+C  || Visual:Prev Camera || 
 
|| Menu+N  || Dialog:New Mission ||
|| Menu+Shift+P  || Dialog:Set Position ||
 
|| Menu+M  || Display:Toggle Messages ||
|| Menu+Shift+M  || Display:Toggle Console ||
 
|| Menu+T  || Select:Clear Target ||
 
|| Menu+G  || Guidance:Set Active ||
|| Shift+Menu+G  || Guidance:Set Inactive ||
|| Menu+B  || Guidance:Set Band Hi ||
|| Shift+Menu+B  || Guidance:Set Band Lo ||
|| Menu+D  || Guidance:RCS Direct On ||
|| Shift+Menu+D  || Guidance:RCS Direct Off ||
|| Menu+O  || Guidance:Attitude Hold ||
|| Shift+Menu+O  || Guidance:Attitude Auto ||
